Title: Enacts the Municipal Oversight Of Natural Systems By Allowing Non-Toxic Options Act
Summary: Allows municipalities to regulate pesticides such that they do not conflict with any laws, rules or regulations related thereto.
LawCode: Amd ยง33-0303, En Con L; add ยง139-f, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the general municipal law, in relation to allowing municipalities to regulate pesticides
